verbs.description: President Trump [V: had] accused Philadelphia Eagles players of abandoning their fans because many had said they would n't show up for a White House celebration .
[ARG0: President Trump] had [V: accused] [ARG1: Philadelphia Eagles players] [ARG2: of abandoning their fans because many had said they would n't show up for a White House celebration] .
President Trump had accused [ARG0: Philadelphia Eagles players] of [V: abandoning] [ARG1: their fans] [ARGM-CAU: because many had said they would n't show up for a White House celebration] .
President Trump had accused Philadelphia Eagles players of abandoning their fans because many [V: had] said they would n't show up for a White House celebration .
President Trump had accused Philadelphia Eagles players of abandoning their fans because [ARG0: many] had [V: said] [ARG1: they would n't show up for a White House celebration] .
President Trump had accused Philadelphia Eagles players of abandoning their fans because many had said they [V: would] n't show up for a White House celebration .

President Trump had accused Philadelphia Eagles players of abandoning their fans because many had said [ARG1: they] [ARGM-MOD: would] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: show] up [ARGM-PRP: for a White House celebration] .
